Methods in org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces that throw ClosedStreamException
 int XAFileInputStream.available()
          Returns the number of bytes (readily) available in the internal buffer of this stream.
 void XAFileOutputStream.flush()
          Flushes the buffer of this stream.
 void XAFileInputStream.position(long n)
          Positions the pointer inside the stream from where the next bytes will be read.
 int XAFileInputStream.read()
          Reads the next byte if available.
 int XAFileInputStream.read(byte[] b)
          Read at least 1 byte, upto b.length bytes from the stream and put them into the array b.
 int XAFileInputStream.read(byte[] b, int off, int length)
          Read at least 1 byte, upto length bytes from the stream and put them into the array b starting at offset off.
 long XAFileInputStream.skip(long n)
          Skips upto n bytes in the stream.
 void XAFileOutputStream.write(byte[] b)
          Writes all bytes from b into the file.
 void XAFileOutputStream.write(byte[] b, int off, int length)
          Writes bytes from array b, starting at offset off, upto total length bytes, into the file.
 void XAFileOutputStream.write(int b)
          Writes the input byte into the file.
